Docs.summary: Determines what to do with a Compute Node and its running task(s) if the Pool size is decreasing. The default value is requeue.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan? ResizeTimeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.TimeSpan> ResizeTimeout
Public Property ResizeTimeout As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
member this.ResizeTimeout : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

Docs.summary: The timeout for allocation of Nodes to the Pool or removal of Compute Nodes from the Pool. The default value is 15 minutes. The minimum value is 5 minutes. If you specify a value less than 5 minutes, the Batch service returns an error; if you are calling the REST API directly, the HTTP status code is 400 (Bad Request).
